svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/7.1.9 Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Electron/1.7.5 Safari/537.36" version="7.1.9" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="e26184be-5fcd-3e33-a76c-36f9f1913ff3" name="RIPng message format"></diagram></mxfile>

div.div:
1 to N routing entries per RIP message.
N determined by the size of link MTU.
